channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NV

item.title: Report X-2024101773
item.description:
Report X-2024101773

Identified by scraper @ 2024-11-01T09:15:08+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-23
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO A LEAKING PACKAGE IN IRREGS. TOOK SPILL CART TO IRREG BELT TO FIND LEAKER. RESPONDER USED DECISION TREE AND FOLLOWED STEPS TO CONTAIN AND CLEAN UP LEAKER. CLEANED UP STILL AND TOOK BACK TO DMP TO PROCESS LEAKER.
